page.title: 20A Visit to Trimley St.Mary
page.content: {Trimley St. Mary Primary school}was built in{1904}and is now being rebuilt.Mr.Dixon, the headmaster told us that the rebuilding is affecting everybody because they keep having to move to different parts of the school.The construction work will result in a modern school but they will all be glad when it's finished. {Mr.Dixon}hopes the school will be ready by mid-summer.The school will be much bigger than{Grange}because it holds 400 pupils.It has a better swimming pool which is heated and has changing rooms.The hall is larger with a large wooden floor. The infant department is designed with an art area and a bay with classrooms leading off.During the rebuilding the pupils have learned much about construction.
